idea-plugin.name: Fish Reader
idea-plugin.description:
This plugin, known as the "Idle Reading" tool, allows you to log into WeChat Reading directly within your IDE, providing an immersive reading experience while disguised as a sidebar, allowing you to read silently during work hours. With reading time accumulation and a leaderboard, it boosts your reading efficiency and enjoyment.
摸鱼阅读让你在IDE中轻松登录微信读书，实现沉浸式阅读体验。侧边栏伪装，帮助你在工作时也能悄无声息地阅读。阅读时长累积，时长排行榜卷起来，提升你的阅读效率与乐趣。
